Prof. J. van Niekerk
My research areas are Bayesian methods, Biostatistics, Spatial Statistics and Computational Statistics. Most of my work has been at the intersection between statistical methods and the computing of those methods. My Google Scholar is available here. I have projects available but also get excited by your project ideas - so feel free to bring your own!
I have three projects spaces available for 2026.



Dr. P.J. van Staden


Mr. A. van Wyk


Mrs. L. Venter


Dr. A. Whata

title: Application
text:
Please apply by selecting a maximum of three researchers who you want to have as a supervisor for your 2026 Honours project.

Loading…

title: Welcome
text:
This website contains information on the research active groups and researchers within the Department of Statistics at the University of Pretoria. Use this information to apply for a project hosted by a specific researcher using the Application tab.
Please note the availablity of the researchers for discussion regarding topics and research on the Researchers page

title: About
text:
This website is maintained by Janet van Niekerk (janet.vanNiekerk@up.ac.za)
It is used to host the Honours research projects information for the Department of Statistics at the University of Pretoria.
